message.content:
{"id": "123523", 
"title": "Previewing a scripted data set mapped to a java event handler throws NullPointerException", 
"description": "(See ScriptExecutor.getClassUsingCustomClassPath). The context will be null in this case. The reason for using the context is to use cached class loaders when possible. We can either provide an external map to use as cache, or not bother with caching at all.", 
"OB": "Previewing a scripted data set mapped to a java event handler throws a NullPointerException due to a null context in the ScriptExecutor.getClassUsingCustomClassPath method.", 
"EB": "The method ScriptExecutor.getClassUsingCustomClassPath should handle the case when the context is null, and either provide an external map as a cache parameter or not involve caching at all.", 
"SR": "To fix this issue, when previewing a scripted data set, ensure that the ScriptExecutor.getClassUsingCustomClassPath method handles the case when the context is null and that an external map is provided as a cache, or caching is disabled."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '123523', 'title': 'Bug 123523Previewing a scripted data set mapped to a java event handler throws NPE', 'description': '(See ScriptExecutor.getClassUsingCustomClassPath). The context will be null in this case. The reason for using the context is to use cached class loaders when possible. We can either provide an external map to use as cache, or not bother with caching at all. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'When previewing a scripted data set we try to get a class loader from the ExecutionContext. '}
